title: Arrow From the South (4U216)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Raider
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Plays to your support area. Each time a companion or ally loses a skirmish involving a [Raider] Man, you may place a [Raider] token here. Archery: Heal a [Raider] archer for each [Raider] token here. Discard this condition.
Lore:	Haradrim is the Gondorian name for Southrons.
Rarity:	U
